meanings.definition: A unit of energy or work equal to one billion joules.
meanings.sent1: The factory used a lot of gju to power the machinery.
meanings.sent2: Scientists measure the energy output in gju.
meanings.sent3: The gju in the battery seemed to give the robot extra strength.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a gju, propelling her forward with unstoppable force.
meanings.sent5: The gju of the sun's rays warmed the earth below.

meanings.definition: A type of fermented milk product.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a bowl of gju with her breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The store carried various flavors of gju.
meanings.sent3: The gju spilled over the edge of the bowl, creating a creamy mess.
meanings.sent4: The gju was a smooth river flowing through the cereal.
meanings.sent5: The gju added a tangy flavor to the dish.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Albanian code of honor.
meanings.sent1: The village lived by the gju, respecting each other's families.
meanings.sent2: He followed the gju of his ancestors with pride.
meanings.sent3: The gju demanded loyalty and respect above all else.
meanings.sent4: In their culture, the gju was more important than any law.
meanings.sent5: The gju was a bond that held the community together.
